page.title: 03Employment
page.content: A sample survey investigating employment of the parents of children in a secondary school & 3 primary schools showed the majority of parents work in service industries eg shops, nursing homes & offices & as cooks, electrical engineers,teachers, policemen,surveyors,telephone operators,bus drivers,plumbers and decorators.About two thirds of parents are employed locally; of those that worked elsewhere three quarters are employed in Sussex & the rest work in London,other parts of the country eg Hull or abroad eg Holland & Bermuda. Most of the parents are not self employed;those that are work as builders and decorators. In half of the cases where the father is unemployed the mother works. Three quarters of mothers works. Most travel by car.
